Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I’m similarly more fitspo than thinspo in how I aspire to be. It’s my body and my life. It doesn’t feel great to have my goals judged but it feels a lot worse to squeeze my life into someone else’s mold. <3   *”To be nobody but yourself in a world that is doing its best to make you everybody else is to fight the hardest battle you are ever going to fight. Never stop.”*  -e e cummings   (Though I’ve never seen this person mentioned on this sub and have never even seen someone argue for increased thinness of a celebrity. Maybe I have selective vision but I hope it’s a rare occurrence.)
